alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 10:50PM MDT until August 08 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1115 PM MDT. * At 1050 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Elba, or 21 miles south of Akron, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elba around 1105 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
